reviewText: Why the hell would I buy two discs for that much money!? I love the series but I don't love it THAT much!
You are only getting 12 Episodes in this set. Very expensive
This is the serie all the episode or what ??
Excellent purchase I do recommend it!
Dont buy this garbage.too expensive. There is a lot site out there and you can watch it for free or wait for the real collection.i saw season 1 to 3 worth $25 each and its blu ray.
You can watch free Google anime kiss search dragon ball super
I also agree that why should anyone pay for bootleg copies!! The real set will come out soon enough and they will be the real deal
Bootleg Copy's not worth a dime what a rip
The delivery day was on time gift pack correct Five star all the way

Doesn't matter if fan made or by Toriyama, still not paying $157. I'll wait till its down to $57. For those who don't have money to burn, patience is key. I got plenty of that. Also yes, it will come down to that price eventually. Just like everthing else the fame of any series gets trumped by the next big thing.
You guys are moron toriyama made them not fan what bunch of dummies.

These are the fan made subs that you can watch online for free and they are trying to charge people an outrageous $157 for it. They should be ashamed and nobody should buy this until the price is fixed. These are not official / legal copies of the show but just bootlegs and they dare to charge this much?  Terrible.
